channel.title: Glitched Items
channel.description:
How would i go about fixing glitched items? They appear as null and when put on i am invisible. I've tried search for an item in the class8 file and change to ID to mine but when i search for an item it doesn't appear, does this mean i don't have the model?
Has nothing to do with this topic but are there any topics on creating client from scratch?
Thanks ~Legit Glitch~

item.title: Glitched Items
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Add them and there model - Put there ints in class 8, and get a model maker, and do your best to make your own, or ask for help, and add it into your models folder in your client

Read full topic
